howToUse.description: Take a sufficient amount and evenly apply it to the scalp and hair, covering from root to tip.
Gently massage the scalp to ensure deep penetration of the oil for effective lice removal.
Use a fine-toothed lice comb to remove dead lice and nits from the hair.
Leave it on for at least 30 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with a mild shampoo.

reviews.name: Priya
reviews.message: LiceQit worked wonders! After just a few applications, my hair was completely lice-free. Plus, it smells amazing and leaves my hair soft.

reviews.name: Rahul
reviews.message: I was worried about using harsh chemicals on my kids, but this herbal formula is gentle and super effective. No more itching, and their hair feels great!

reviews.name: Ananya
reviews.message: Finally, a lice treatment that actually works without damaging my hair! The natural ingredients make my scalp feel fresh and healthy.

reviews.name: Vikram
reviews.message: So easy to use! Just applied, left it on, and washed it off. No lice, no irritation, and my hair smells so much better than with chemical treatments.

reviews.name: Neha
reviews.message: Tried many lice treatments before, but this is by far the best. It removes lice quickly while nourishing my hair. Highly recommend!

faq.question: Is Amrutveni LiceQit safe for children?
faq.answer: Yes, Amrutveni LiceQit is made with natural ingredients and is completely free from harmful chemicals, making it safe for children and adults.

faq.question: How often should I use it to remove lice completely?
faq.answer: For best results, apply it 2-3 times a week until all lice and nits are gone. Regular use helps prevent reinfestation.

faq.question: Does it have a strong smell like chemical lice treatments?
faq.answer: No, Amrutveni LiceQit has a mild, herbal fragrance that leaves hair smelling fresh and clean.
